title: Bug 11314 - Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
OB: In the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress), when replacing 'com.ibm.foobar' with 'co~.ib~.foobar', the compressed name is not smaller. The package name compression should only replace a fragment if the compressed name is smaller. For example, 'com.' should not be replaced in this case since 'co~.' is the same length and contains less information.
